attributes.action: Call the in/out referendum in the first 6 months of 2016.
attributes.background: The people of Britain need to have this vote now..Negotiations with the EU are failing. Give the voters of this great country of ours the voice they deserve.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104838

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
